div.p: ... meris ... of Areios the ... vaulted ... royal ... ... notification of 242 (artabas) of grain and the winnowing of these ... and we received from Heroides a note in his own hand that he had received in full the aforementioned amount, making clear that he would measure it out until the 30th of the same month; and giving the grain to Ptolemaios, the granary guard there, we got from him a copy in the hand of Heroides, in the presence of the aforementioned (people), concerning the fact that (the grain) was in storage in accordance with what has been written; and from that time, Heroides has delayed measuring out the grain. And on the 28th of Mesore, arriving at the aforementioned granary, and wishing to take away the grain, we found … putting ...

... Ptolemaios ... in the ... in Krokodilopolis ... please write to whom it concerns to stand Ptolemaios ... examine ... the grain to the crown ... measure ... to the crown ... aTranslation: J. Bauschatz (via PN in 2014)
